ygData.subject: Are you having trouble?
ygData.msgSnippet: You might be having trouble logging into Everquest if you don t stop reading this message. When you download the patch one file that it shows is _verquest.doc
ygData.messageBody:
You might be having trouble logging into Everquest if you don't stop
reading this message.
When you download the patch one file that it shows is _verquest.doc
but deleteing that file won't work because it will just appear again.

Here are some things you could download Directx 8.1 if you don't
have it because you need it to play Shawdows of Lurcin, You could
Email coustomer support, you can scan your computer for errors, or you
can ask other people for help.

If you have any other problems solutions Email me at
desking09@....


X576:73jdi/472

Visit my group at http: //www.groups.yahoo.com/group/everquest_plus
